name: Nerja
description: "Nerja" is a charming original watercolor painting by Maryna Riepnova. This exquisite artwork, measuring 26x36 cm, beautifully captures the quintessential white-washed buildings and vibrant blue waters of the famous coastal town of Nerja, near Málaga. Maryna's unique style brings the sun-drenched atmosphere and picturesque charm of this beloved destination to life. It's an ideal piece for art collectors who love Spanish landscapes, coastal scenes, or a cherished souvenir of Andalusia.
